Question
========
Which section of an R package help file would you reference to learn the order in which the function arguments are
specified in the function definition?

Answerlist
----------
* Description
* Usage
* Arguments
* Details
* Value
* See Also
* Examples

Solution
========
The *Usage* section shows all the possible arguments for a function and the order in which those arguments are defined.
